trans-unit.source: Accordingly, behavioral parameters in stream pipelines whose source might not be concurrent should never modify the stream's data source. A behavioral parameter is said to interfere with a non-concurrent data source if it modifies, or causes to be modified, the stream's data source. The need for non-interference applies to all pipelines, not just parallel ones. Unless the stream source is concurrent, modifying a stream's data source during execution of a stream pipeline can cause exceptions, incorrect answers, or nonconformant behavior. For well-behaved stream sources, the source can be modified before the terminal operation commences and those modifications will be reflected in the covered elements. For example, consider the following code:
trans-unit.target: 因此，源可能不是并发的流管道中的行为参数永远不应修改流的数据源。如果行为参数修改或导致修改流的数据源，则该行为参数会干扰非并发数据源。无干扰的需求适用于所有管道，而不仅仅是并行管道。除非流源是并发的，否则在流管道执行期间修改流的数据源可能会导致异常，错误的答案或不一致的行为。对于行为良好的流源，可以在终端操作开始之前修改源，并且这些修改将反映在所涵盖的元素中。例如，考虑以下代码：

trans-unit.source: Acquire access mode; this segment support sharing with threads other than the owner thread, via spliterator (see spliterator(MemorySegment, SequenceLayout)).

trans-unit.source: Acquire the user's credentials and verify them against the specified LDAP directory.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户的凭证,并根据指定的LDAP目录进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a lock on the given region of this channel's file.
trans-unit.target: 获取该通道文件中指定区域的锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a lock to begin mutating the document this lock protects.
trans-unit.target: 获取一把锁,开始对该锁保护的文件进行突变。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a lock to begin mutating the document this lock protects. There can be no writing, notification of changes, or reading going on in order to gain the lock. Additionally a thread is allowed to gain more than one writeLock, as long as it doesn't attempt to gain additional writeLocks from within document notification. Attempting to gain a writeLock from within a DocumentListener notification will result in an IllegalStateException. The ability to obtain more than one writeLock per thread allows subclasses to gain a writeLock, perform a number of operations, then release the lock.
trans-unit.target: 获取锁以开始更改此锁保护的文档。不能进行任何写作，更改通知或阅读以获取锁定。另外，只要一个线程不尝试从文档通知中获取其他 writeLock ，就允许该线程获取多个 writeLock 。尝试从DocumentListener通知中获取 writeLock 将导致 IllegalStateException 。每个线程获得一个以上的 writeLock 的能力允许子类获得一个writeLock，执行许多操作，然后释放该锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a lock to begin reading some state from the document.
trans-unit.target: 获得一个锁,开始读取文档中的一些状态。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a lock to begin reading some state from the document. There can be multiple readers at the same time. Writing blocks the readers until notification of the change to the listeners has been completed. This method should be used very carefully to avoid unintended compromise of the document. It should always be balanced with a readUnlock.
trans-unit.target: 获取锁以开始从文档中读取某些状态。可以同时有多个阅读器。写作会阻塞读者，直到完成向听众所做的更改通知为止。应非常小心地使用此方法，以免意外破坏文档。它应该始终与 readUnlock 保持平衡。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a permit from this semaphore, blocking until one is available, or the thread is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 从此信号量获取许可，直到获得一个许可或线程被中断为止，才进行许可。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a permit from this semaphore, blocking until one is available, or the thread is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 从此信号量获取许可，阻塞直到可用，否则线程被中断。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a permit from this semaphore, blocking until one is available.
trans-unit.target: 从这个信号机上获取一个许可,在有许可之前先阻断。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a permit from this semaphore, if one becomes available within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在给定的等待时间内可用，并且当前线程尚未中断，则从此信号量获取许可。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a permit from this semaphore, if one becomes available within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在给定的等待时间内可用，并且当前线程尚未中断，则从此信号量获取许可。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a permit from this semaphore, only if one is available at the time of invocation.
trans-unit.target: 只有在调用时有空闲的情况下,才能从该信号体获得许可。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a permit, if one is available and returns immediately, reducing the number of available permits by one.
trans-unit.target: 在有许可证的情况下,获得一个许可证,并立即返回,将可用许可证的数量减少一个;

trans-unit.source: Acquires a permit, if one is available and returns immediately, with the value true, reducing the number of available permits by one.
trans-unit.target: 如果许可证可用，则获取许可证，然后立即返回，值为 true ，将可用许可证的数量减少一个。

trans-unit.source: Acquires an exclusive lock on this channel's file.
trans-unit.target: 获得该通道文件的专属锁定。

trans-unit.source: Acquires and returns all permits that are immediately available, or if negative permits are available, releases them.
trans-unit.target: 获得并归还所有可立即使用的许可证,如果没有许可证,则予以放行;

trans-unit.source: Acquires and returns all permits that are immediately available, or if negative permits are available, releases them. Upon return, zero permits are available.
trans-unit.target: 获得并归还所有可立即使用的许可证,如果没有许可证,则予以发放。归还时,可用的许可证为零。

trans-unit.source: Acquires and returns all permits that are immediately available.
trans-unit.target: 获取并归还所有可立即使用的许可证。

trans-unit.source: Acquires in exclusive mode, aborting if interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 在独占模式下获取,如果中断则中止。

trans-unit.source: Acquires in exclusive mode, aborting if interrupted. Implemented by first checking interrupt status, then invoking at least once tryAcquire(int), returning on success. Otherwise the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking tryAcquire(int) until success or the thread is interrupted. This method can be used to implement method Lock.lockInterruptibly().
trans-unit.target: 以互斥模式进行获取，如果被中断则中止。通过首先检查中断状态，然后至少调用一次 tryAcquire(int) 来实现，并成功返回。否则，线程将排队，并可能反复阻塞和解除阻塞，并调用 tryAcquire(int) 直到成功或线程被中断为止。此方法可用于实现方法 Lock.lockInterruptibly() 。

trans-unit.source: Acquires in exclusive mode, aborting if interrupted. Implemented by first checking interrupt status, then invoking at least once tryAcquire(long), returning on success. Otherwise the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking tryAcquire(long) until success or the thread is interrupted. This method can be used to implement method Lock.lockInterruptibly().
trans-unit.target: 以互斥模式进行获取，如果被中断则中止。通过首先检查中断状态，然后至少调用一次 tryAcquire(long) 来实现，并成功返回。否则，将线程排队，并可能反复阻塞和解除阻塞，并调用 tryAcquire(long) 直到成功或线程被中断为止。此方法可用于实现方法 Lock.lockInterruptibly() 。

This method can be used to implement method Lock.lockInterruptibly().

Otherwise the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking tryAcquire(int) until success. This method can be used to implement method Lock.lock().

trans-unit.target: 从此信号量获取给定数量的许可，阻塞直到所有可用，否则线程被中断。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits from this semaphore, blocking until all are available.
trans-unit.target: 从该旗语中获取给定数量的许可,并阻断所有许可,直到所有许可可用。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits from this semaphore, if all become available within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有信号在给定的等待时间内可用，并且当前线程未中断，则从该信号量获取给定数量的许可。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits from this semaphore, if all become available within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有信号都在给定的等待时间内可用，并且当前线程未中断，则从此信号量获取给定数量的许可。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits from this semaphore, only if all are available at the time of invocation.
trans-unit.target: 从本旗语中获取指定数量的许可,但前提是在调用时所有许可都可用。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits, if they are available and returns immediately, with the value true, reducing the number of available permits by the given amount.
trans-unit.target: 如果有可用许可证，则获取给定数量的许可证，然后立即返回 true 值，将可用许可证的数量减少给定数量。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits, if they are available, and returns immediately, reducing the number of available permits by the given amount.
trans-unit.target: 如果有给定数量的许可证,则获得给定数量的许可证,并立即返回,减少给定数量的可用许可证。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits, if they are available, and returns immediately, reducing the number of available permits by the given amount. This method has the same effect as the loop for (int i = 0; i < permits; ++i) acquire(); except that it atomically acquires the permits all at once:
trans-unit.target: 如果有可用许可证，则获取给定数量的许可证，然后立即返回，从而将可用许可证的数量减少给定数量。此方法与 for (int i = 0; i < permits; ++i) acquire(); 的循环具有相同的效果。除了它原子性地一次获得所有许可证外：

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits, if they are available, and returns immediately, reducing the number of available permits by the given amount. This method has the same effect as the loop for (int i = 0; i < permits; ++i) acquireUninterruptibly(); except that it atomically acquires the permits all at once:
trans-unit.target: 如果有可用许可证，则获取给定数量的许可证，然后立即返回，从而将可用许可证的数量减少给定数量。此方法与 for (int i = 0; i < permits; ++i) acquireUninterruptibly(); 的循环具有相同的效果。除了它原子性地一次获得所有许可证外：

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits, if they are available, and returns immediately, with the value true, reducing the number of available permits by the given amount.
trans-unit.target: 获取给定数量的许可证（如果有），并立即返回 true 值，将可用数量减少给定数量。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is available and returns immediately with the value true. If the lock is not available then this method will return immediately with the value false.
trans-unit.target: 获取锁（如果有）并立即返回 true 值。如果锁不可用，则此方法将立即返回 false 值。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is available and returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果有锁,则获取锁,并立即返回。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is free within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果锁在给定的等待时间内是空闲的，并且当前线程尚未中断，则获取该锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is free within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果锁在给定的等待时间内是空闲的，并且当前线程尚未中断，则获取该锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is not held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true, setting the lock hold count to one. Even when this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy, a call to tryLock()will immediately acquire the lock if it is available, whether or not other threads are currently waiting for the lock. This "barging" behavior can be useful in certain circumstances, even though it breaks fairness. If you want to honor the fairness setting for this lock, then use tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) which is almost equivalent (it also detects interruption).
trans-unit.target: 如果没有其他线程持有该锁，则获取该锁，并立即返回 true ，将锁的保持计数设置为一个。即使已将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，对 tryLock() 的调用也会立即获取该锁（如果可用），无论其他线程当前是否在等待该锁。即使破坏公平性，这种“讨价还价”的行为在某些情况下还是有用的。如果要遵守此锁的公平性设置，请使用几乎等效的 tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) （它还会检测到中断）。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is not held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true, setting the lock hold count to one. Even when this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy, a call to tryLock()will immediately acquire the lock if it is available, whether or not other threads are currently waiting for the lock. This "barging" behavior can be useful in certain circumstances, even though it breaks fairness. If you want to honor the fairness setting for this lock, then use tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) which is almost equivalent (it also detects interruption).
trans-unit.target: 如果没有其他线程持有该锁，则获取该锁，并立即返回 true ，将锁的保持计数设置为一个。即使已将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，对 tryLock() 的调用也会立即获取该锁（如果可用），无论其他线程当前是否在等待该锁。即使破坏公平性，这种“讨价还价”的行为在某些情况下还是有用的。如果要遵守此锁的公平性设置，请使用几乎等效的 tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) （它还会检测到中断）。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is not held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true, setting the lock hold count to one. If this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy then an available lock will not be acquired if any other threads are waiting for the lock. This is in contrast to the tryLock() method. If you want a timed tryLock that does permit barging on a fair lock then combine the timed and un-timed forms together:
trans-unit.target: 如果没有其他线程持有该锁，则获取该锁，并立即返回 true ，将锁的保持计数设置为一个。如果已将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，则如果任何其他线程正在等待该锁，则将不会获取可用的锁。这与 tryLock() 方法相反。如果要使用确实允许对公平锁定进行插入操作的定时 tryLock ，则将定时形式和非定时形式组合在一起：

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is not held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true, setting the lock hold count to one. If this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy then an available lock will not be acquired if any other threads are waiting for the lock. This is in contrast to the tryLock() method. If you want a timed tryLock that does permit barging on a fair lock then combine the timed and un-timed forms together:
trans-unit.target: 如果没有其他线程持有该锁，则获取该锁，并立即返回 true ，将锁的保持计数设置为一个。如果已将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，则如果任何其他线程正在等待该锁，则不会获取可用锁。这与 tryLock() 方法相反。如果您想要定时的 tryLock 确实允许对公平锁进行插入，则将定时和非定时形式组合在一起：

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is not held by another thread and returns immediately, setting the lock hold count to one.
trans-unit.target: 如果锁没有被其他线程持有,则获得锁,并立即返回,将锁的持有数设为1。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is not held by another thread within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在给定的等待时间内另一个线程未持有该锁，并且当前线程尚未中断，则获取该锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is not held by another thread within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在给定的等待时间内另一个线程未持有该锁并且当前线程尚未中断，则获取该锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock only if it is free at the time of invocation.
trans-unit.target: 只有在调用时是空闲的情况下才会获得锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock only if it is not held by another thread at the time of invocation.
trans-unit.target: 只有在调用时没有被其他线程持有的情况下才会获得锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock unless the current thread is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 除非当前线程被中断，否则获取锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock unless the current thread is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 除非当前线程被中断，否则获取锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock.
trans-unit.target: 获得锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock if the write lock is not held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true. Even when this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy, a call to tryLock()will immediately acquire the read lock if it is available, whether or not other threads are currently waiting for the read lock. This "barging" behavior can be useful in certain circumstances, even though it breaks fairness. If you want to honor the fairness setting for this lock, then use tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) which is almost equivalent (it also detects interruption).
trans-unit.target: 如果写锁没有被另一个线程持有，则获取读锁，并立即返回 true 值。即使已将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，对 tryLock() 的调用也会立即获取读取锁（如果可用），无论当前是否有其他线程在等待读取锁。即使破坏公平性，这种“讨价还价”的行为在某些情况下还是有用的。如果要遵守此锁的公平性设置，请使用几乎等效的 tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) （它还会检测到中断）。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock if the write lock is not held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true. Even when this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy, a call to tryLock()will immediately acquire the read lock if it is available, whether or not other threads are currently waiting for the read lock. This "barging" behavior can be useful in certain circumstances, even though it breaks fairness. If you want to honor the fairness setting for this lock, then use tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) which is almost equivalent (it also detects interruption).
trans-unit.target: 如果写锁未被另一个线程持有，则获取读锁，并立即返回 true 值。即使已将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，对 tryLock() 的调用也会立即获取读取锁（如果可用），无论其他线程当前是否在等待读取锁。即使破坏公平性，这种“讨价还价”的行为在某些情况下还是有用的。如果要遵守此锁的公平性设置，请使用几乎等效的 tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) （它还会检测到中断）。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock if the write lock is not held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true. If this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy then an available lock will not be acquired if any other threads are waiting for the lock. This is in contrast to the tryLock() method. If you want a timed tryLock that does permit barging on a fair lock then combine the timed and un-timed forms together:
trans-unit.target: 如果写锁未被另一个线程持有，则获取读锁，并立即返回 true 值。如果已将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，则如果任何其他线程正在等待该锁，则将不会获取可用的锁。这与 tryLock() 方法相反。如果要使用确实允许对公平锁定进行插入操作的定时 tryLock ，则将定时形式和非定时形式组合在一起：

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock if the write lock is not held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true. If you want a timed tryLock that does permit barging on a fair lock then combine the timed and un-timed forms together:
trans-unit.target: 如果写锁未被另一个线程持有，则获取读锁，并立即返回 true 值。如果已将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，则如果任何其他线程正在等待该锁，则不会获取可用锁。这与 tryLock() 方法相反。如果您想要定时的 tryLock 确实允许对公平锁进行插入，则将定时和非定时形式组合在一起：

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock if the write lock is not held by another thread and returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果写锁没有被其他线程持有,则获得读锁,并立即返回。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock if the write lock is not held by another thread within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在给定的等待时间内另一个线程未持有写锁定，并且当前线程尚未中断，则获取读锁定。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock if the write lock is not held by another thread within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在给定的等待时间内另一个线程未持有写锁定，并且当前线程尚未中断，则获取读锁定。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock only if the write lock is not held by another thread at the time of invocation.
trans-unit.target: 只有在调用时写锁没有被另一个线程持有时,才会获得读锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock unless the current thread is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 除非当前线程被中断，否则获取读锁定。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock unless the current thread is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 除非当前线程被中断，否则获取读锁定。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock.
trans-unit.target: 获得读取锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock if it is not held by another thread within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在给定的等待时间内另一个线程未持有该写锁，并且当前线程尚未中断，则获取该写锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock if it is not held by another thread within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在给定的等待时间内另一个线程未持有该写锁，并且当前线程尚未中断，则获取该写锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock if neither the read nor write lock are held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true, setting the write lock hold count to one. Even when this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy, a call to tryLock()will immediately acquire the lock if it is available, whether or not other threads are currently waiting for the write lock. This "barging" behavior can be useful in certain circumstances, even though it breaks fairness. If you want to honor the fairness setting for this lock, then use tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) which is almost equivalent (it also detects interruption).
trans-unit.target: 如果读取和写入锁均未由另一个线程持有，则获取写入锁，并立即返回 true 值，将写入锁的保持计数设置为1。即使已将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，对 tryLock() 的调用也会立即获取该锁（如果可用），无论其他线程当前是否在等待写锁。即使破坏公平性，这种“讨价还价”的行为在某些情况下还是有用的。如果要遵守此锁的公平性设置，请使用几乎等效的 tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) （它还会检测到中断）。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock if neither the read nor write lock are held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true, setting the write lock hold count to one. Even when this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy, a call to tryLock()will immediately acquire the lock if it is available, whether or not other threads are currently waiting for the write lock. This "barging" behavior can be useful in certain circumstances, even though it breaks fairness. If you want to honor the fairness setting for this lock, then use tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) which is almost equivalent (it also detects interruption).
trans-unit.target: 如果读取和写入锁均未由另一个线程持有，则获取写入锁，并立即返回 true 值，将写入锁的保持计数设置为1。即使已将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，对 tryLock() 的调用也将立即获取该锁（如果可用），无论其他线程当前是否在等待写锁。即使破坏公平性，这种“讨价还价”的行为在某些情况下还是有用的。如果要遵守此锁的公平性设置，请使用几乎等效的 tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) （它还会检测到中断）。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock if neither the read nor write lock are held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true, setting the write lock hold count to one. If this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy then an available lock will not be acquired if any other threads are waiting for the write lock. This is in contrast to the tryLock() method. If you want a timed tryLock that does permit barging on a fair lock then combine the timed and un-timed forms together:
trans-unit.target: 如果读取和写入锁均未由另一个线程持有，则获取写入锁，并立即返回 true 值，将写入锁的保持计数设置为1。如果将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，那么如果任何其他线程正在等待写锁，则不会获取可用锁。这与 tryLock() 方法相反。如果要使用确实允许对公平锁定进行插入操作的定时 tryLock ，则将定时形式和非定时形式组合在一起：

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock if neither the read nor write lock are held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true, setting the write lock hold count to one. If this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy then an available lock will not be acquired if any other threads are waiting for the write lock. This is in contrast to the tryLock() method. If you want a timed tryLock that does permit barging on a fair lock then combine the timed and un-timed forms together:
trans-unit.target: 如果读取和写入锁均未由另一个线程持有，则获取写入锁，并立即返回 true 值，将写入锁的保持计数设置为1。如果已将此锁定设置为使用公平的排序策略，则如果任何其他线程正在等待写锁定，则不会获取可用的锁定。这与 tryLock() 方法相反。如果您想要定时的 tryLock 确实允许对公平锁进行插入，则将定时和非定时形式组合在一起：

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock if neither the read nor write lock are held by another thread and returns immediately, setting the write lock hold count to one.
trans-unit.target: 如果读锁和写锁都没有被其他线程持有,则获得写锁,并立即返回,将写锁持有数设为1。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock only if it is not held by another thread at the time of invocation.
trans-unit.target: 只有在调用时没有被其他线程持有的情况下,才会获得写锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock unless the current thread is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 除非当前线程被中断，否则获取写锁定。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock unless the current thread is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 除非当前线程被中断，否则获取写锁定。

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: Action

trans-unit.source: Action Key
trans-unit.target: 动作要领

trans-unit.source: Action assigned by default to handle the Block task of the reader.
trans-unit.target: 默认分配给读者处理Block任务的动作。

trans-unit.source: Action assigned by default to handle the Character task of the reader.
trans-unit.target: 默认分配给读者处理字符任务的动作。

trans-unit.source: Action assigned by default to handle the Hidden task of the reader.
trans-unit.target: 默认分配给读者处理隐藏任务的动作。

trans-unit.source: Action assigned by default to handle the Isindex task of the reader.
trans-unit.target: 默认分配给阅读器的Isindex任务的动作。

trans-unit.source: Action assigned by default to handle the Paragraph task of the reader.
trans-unit.target: 默认分配给读者处理段落任务的动作。

trans-unit.source: Action assigned by default to handle the Pre block task of the reader.
trans-unit.target: 默认分配给阅读器的Pre block任务的动作。

trans-unit.source: Action assigned by default to handle the Special task of the reader.
trans-unit.target: 默认分配给读者处理特殊任务的动作。

trans-unit.source: Action events are enabled via enableEvents.
trans-unit.target: 动作事件通过 enableEvents 启用。

trans-unit.source: Action indicating that a coding error is to be handled by dropping the erroneous input and resuming the coding operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示要处理编码错误的动作,放弃错误的输入,恢复编码操作。

trans-unit.source: Action indicating that a coding error is to be handled by dropping the erroneous input, appending the coder's replacement value to the output buffer, and resuming the coding operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示要处理编码错误的动作,放弃错误的输入,将编码器的替换值追加到输出缓冲区,并恢复编码操作。

trans-unit.source: Action indicating that a coding error is to be reported, either by returning a CoderResult object or by throwing a CharacterCodingException, whichever is appropriate for the method implementing the coding process.
trans-unit.target: 通过返回 CoderResult 对象或引发 CharacterCodingException 来指示要报告编码错误的操作，以适合于实现编码过程的方法为准。

trans-unit.source: Action to support forms by building all of the elements used to represent form controls.
trans-unit.target: 通过构建所有用于表示表单控件的元素来支持表单的动作。

trans-unit.source: Action to support forms by building all of the elements used to represent form controls. This will process the <INPUT>, <TEXTAREA>, <SELECT>, and <OPTION> tags. The element created by this action is expected to have the attribute StyleConstants.ModelAttribute set to the model that holds the state for the form control. This enables multiple views, and allows document to be iterated over picking up the data of the form. The following are the model assignments for the various type of form elements.
trans-unit.target: 通过构建用于表示表单控件的所有元素来支持表单的操作。这将处理<INPUT>，<TEXTAREA>，<SELECT>和<OPTION>标记。通过此操作创建的元素应具有设置为包含表单控件状态的模型的 StyleConstants.ModelAttribute 属性。这将启用多个视图，并允许在获取表单数据时对文档进行迭代。以下是各种类型的表单元素的模型分配。

trans-unit.source: Action value with name Action.ACTION_COMMAND_KEY, unless null.
trans-unit.target: 名称为Action.ACTION_COMMAND_KEY的操作值，除非为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Activate the object associated with the activation identifier, id.
trans-unit.target: 激活与激活标识符 id 关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: Activate the object associated with the activation identifier, id. If the activator knows the object to be active already, and force is false , the stub with a "live" reference is returned immediately to the caller; otherwise, if the activator does not know that corresponding the remote object is active, the activator uses the activation descriptor information (previously registered) to determine the group (VM) in which the object should be activated. If an ActivationInstantiator corresponding to the object's group descriptor already exists, the activator invokes the activation group's newInstance method passing it the object's id and descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 激活与激活标识符 id 关联的对象。如果激活器知道该对象已经处于活动状态，并且 force 为false，则将带有“实时”引用的存根立即返回给调用者；否则，将返回给调用者。否则，如果激活器不知道对应的远程对象是活动的，则激活器使用激活描述符信息（先前注册的）来确定应在其中激活对象的组（VM）。如果已经存在与对象的组描述符相对应的 ActivationInstantiator ，则激活器将调用激活组的 newInstance 方法，并向其传递对象的ID和描述符。

trans-unit.source: Actually performs the painting operation. Subclasses must implement this method. The graphics object passed may represent the actual surface being rendered to, or it may be an intermediate buffer. It has also been pre-translated. Simply render the component as if it were located at 0, 0 and had a width of width and a height of height. For performance reasons, you may want to read the clip from the Graphics2D object and only render within that space.
trans-unit.target: 实际执行绘画操作。子类必须实现此方法。传递的图形对象可以表示要渲染到的实际表面，也可以是中间缓冲区。它也已被预先翻译。简单地渲染该组件，就好像它位于0、0并具有width的 width 和height的 height 。出于性能原因，您可能需要从Graphics2D对象读取剪辑，并且仅在该空间内渲染。

trans-unit.source: Adapt an existing var handle into a new var handle whose carrier type is MemoryAddress.
trans-unit.target: 将现有的var句柄改编为载体类型为 MemoryAddress 的新var句柄。

trans-unit.source: Adapt an existing var handle into a new var handle whose carrier type is MemoryAddress. That is, when calling VarHandle.get(Object...) on the returned var handle, the read numeric value will be turned into a memory address (as if by calling MemoryAddress.ofLong(long)); similarly, when calling VarHandle.set(Object...), the memory address to be set will be converted into a numeric value, and then written into memory. The amount of bytes read (resp. written) from (resp. to) memory depends on the carrier of the original memory access var handle.
trans-unit.target: 将现有的var句柄改编为载体类型为 MemoryAddress 的新var句柄。也就是说，在返回的var句柄上调用 VarHandle.get(Object...) 时，读取的数值将转换为内存地址（就像通过调用 MemoryAddress.ofLong(long) ）一样；同样，当调用 VarHandle.set(Object...) ，要设置的内存地址将转换为数值，然后写入内存。从（重新写入）内存读取（重新写入）的字节数取决于原始内存访问var句柄的载体。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a Collector accepting elements of type U to one accepting elements of type T by applying a flat mapping function to each input element before accumulation.
trans-unit.target: 通过在累加之前对每个输入元素应用平面映射函数，将类型为 U 的 Collector 接受元素调整为类型为 T 的一个接受元素。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a Collector accepting elements of type U to one accepting elements of type T by applying a flat mapping function to each input element before accumulation. The flat mapping function maps an input element to a stream covering zero or more output elements that are then accumulated downstream. Each mapped stream is closed after its contents have been placed downstream. (If a mapped stream is null an empty stream is used, instead.)
trans-unit.target: 通过在累加之前对每个输入元素应用平面映射函数，将类型为 U 的 Collector 接受元素调整为类型为 T 的一个接受元素。平面映射功能将输入元素映射到覆盖零个或多个输出元素的 stream ，然后将其累积到下游。将每个映射流的内容放置在下游之后，将其 closed 。（如果映射的流为 null ，则使用空流。）

trans-unit.source: Adapts a Collector accepting elements of type U to one accepting elements of type T by applying a mapping function to each input element before accumulation.
trans-unit.target: 通过在累加之前对每个输入元素应用映射函数，将类型为 U 的 Collector 接受元素调整为类型为 T 的一个接受元素。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a Collector to one accepting elements of the same type T by applying the predicate to each input element and only accumulating if the predicate returns true.
trans-unit.target: 通过将谓词应用于每个输入元素，并仅在谓词返回 true 时累加，才能使 Collector 适应相同类型 T 的一个接受元素。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a Collector to perform an additional finishing transformation. For example, one could adapt the toList() collector to always produce an immutable list with:

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target method handle by post-processing its return value (if any) with a filter (another method handle).
trans-unit.target: 通过使用过滤器(另一个方法句柄)对目标方法句柄进行后处理(如果有的话)。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target method handle by post-processing its return value (if any) with a filter (another method handle). The result of the filter is returned from the adapter.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用过滤器(另一个方法句柄)对目标方法句柄的返回值(如果有的话)进行后处理来适应它。过滤器的结果由适配器返回。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target method handle by pre-processing a sub-sequence of its arguments with a filter (another method handle).
trans-unit.target: 通过使用过滤器(另一个方法句柄)对其参数的子序列进行预处理来调整目标方法句柄。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target method handle by pre-processing a sub-sequence of its arguments with a filter (another method handle). The pre-processed arguments are replaced by the result (if any) of the filter function. The target is then called on the modified (usually shortened) argument list.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用过滤器(另一个方法句柄)对目标方法句柄的参数子序列进行预处理来调整目标方法句柄。预处理后的参数被过滤器函数的结果(如果有的话)替换。然后根据修改后的(通常是缩短的)参数列表调用目标方法。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target method handle by pre-processing one or more of its arguments, each with its own unary filter function, and then calling the target with each pre-processed argument replaced by the result of its corresponding filter function.
trans-unit.target: 通过对目标方法的一个或多个参数进行预处理来调整目标方法句柄,每个参数都有自己的一元过滤函数,然后调用目标方法,每个预处理后的参数都被其对应的过滤函数的结果所替代。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target method handle by pre-processing some of its arguments, and then calling the target with the result of the pre-processing, inserted into the original sequence of arguments.
trans-unit.target: 通过对目标方法的一些参数进行预处理来调整目标方法句柄,然后用预处理的结果调用目标方法,并插入到原始参数序列中。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target method handle by pre-processing some of its arguments, starting at a given position, and then calling the target with the result of the pre-processing, inserted into the original sequence of arguments just before the folded arguments.
trans-unit.target: 通过预处理目标方法句柄,从给定的位置开始,对目标方法句柄进行调整,然后用预处理的结果调用目标方法,将预处理的结果插入到原始参数序列中,正好在折叠的参数之前。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target method handle to match the given parameter type list.
trans-unit.target: 调整目标方法句柄以匹配给定的参数类型列表。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target method handle to match the given parameter type list. If necessary, adds dummy arguments. Some leading parameters can be skipped before matching begins. The remaining types in the target's parameter type list must be a sub-list of the newTypes type list at the starting position pos. The resulting handle will have the target handle's parameter type list, with any non-matching parameter types (before or after the matching sub-list) inserted in corresponding positions of the target's original parameters, as if by dropArguments(MethodHandle, int, Class[]).
trans-unit.target: 调整目标方法句柄以匹配给定的参数类型列表。如有必要，添加伪参数。在匹配开始之前，可以跳过一些前导参数。 target 参数类型列表中的其余类型必须是起始位置 pos 处 newTypes 类型列表的子列表。结果句柄将具有目标句柄的参数类型列表，并且在目标原始参数的相应位置插入任何不匹配的参数类型（在匹配子列表之前或之后），就像通过 dropArguments(MethodHandle, int, Class[]) 。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target var handle by narrowing incoming values and widening outgoing values, to and from the given type, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 通过缩小传入的值和扩大传出的值,分别适应给定类型和来自给定类型的目标变量句柄。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target var handle by pre-processing incoming and outgoing values using a pair of filter functions.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用一对过滤器函数对传入和传出的值进行预处理来调整目标var句柄。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target var handle by pre-processing incoming coordinate values using unary filter functions.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用一元过滤器函数对传入的坐标值进行预处理来调整目标变量句柄。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target var handle handle by pre-processing a sub-sequence of its coordinate values with a filter (a method handle).
trans-unit.target: 通过用过滤器(方法句柄)对其坐标值的子序列进行预处理来适应目标变量句柄。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target var handle handle by pre-processing a sub-sequence of its coordinate values with a filter (a method handle). The pre-processed coordinates are replaced by the result (if any) of the filter function and the target var handle is then called on the modified (usually shortened) coordinate list.
trans-unit.target: 通过用过滤器(方法句柄)预处理目标变量句柄的坐标值子序列来调整目标变量句柄。预处理后的坐标被过滤器函数的结果(如果有的话)所取代,然后在修改后的坐标列表(通常是缩短的)上调用目标变量句柄。

trans-unit.source: Adapts any DOM node to resolve namespaces so that an XPath expression can be easily evaluated relative to the context of the node where it appeared within the document.
trans-unit.target: 适应任何DOM节点来解析命名空间,以便XPath表达式可以很容易地相对于它在文档中出现的节点的上下文进行评估。

trans-unit.source: Adapts any DOM node to resolve namespaces so that an XPath expression can be easily evaluated relative to the context of the node where it appeared within the document. This adapter works like the DOM Level 3 method lookupNamespaceURI on nodes in resolving the namespaceURI from a given prefix using the current information available in the node's hierarchy at the time lookupNamespaceURI is called. also correctly resolving the implicit xml prefix.
trans-unit.target: 调整任何DOM节点以解析名称空间，以便可以相对于XPath表达式相对于其在文档中出现的节点的上下文进行评估。在 lookupNamespaceURI ，此适配器的工作原理类似于节点上的DOM级别3方法lookupNamespaceURI，它使用节点层次结构中可用的当前信息从给定的前缀解析namespaceURI。还可以正确解析隐式xml前缀。

trans-unit.source: Add all the values contained in the specified map t to this TabularData instance. This method converts the collection of values contained in this map into an array of CompositeData values, if possible, and then call the method putAll(CompositeData[]). Note that the keys used in the specified map t are ignored. This method allows, for example to add the content of another TabularData instance with the same row type (but possibly different index names) into this instance.
trans-unit.target: 将指定映射 t 中包含的所有值添加到此 TabularData 实例。如果可能，此方法将此映射中包含的值的集合转换为 CompositeData 值的数组，然后调用方法 putAll(CompositeData[]) 。注意，指定映射 t 中使用的键将被忽略。例如，此方法允许将另一个具有相同行类型（但索引名称可能不同）的 TabularData 实例的内容添加到该实例中。

trans-unit.source: Additional TIFF tags must be organized into TIFFTagSets. A TIFFTagSet may be provided to the reader by means of the addAllowedTagSet method. By default, the tag sets BaselineTIFFTagSet, FaxTIFFTagSet, ExifParentTIFFTagSet, and GeoTIFFTagSet are included.
trans-unit.target: 必须将其他TIFF标签组织到 TIFFTagSet 中。甲 TIFFTagSet 可通过的方式提供给读者 addAllowedTagSet 方法。默认情况下，包含标签集 BaselineTIFFTagSet ， FaxTIFFTagSet ， ExifParentTIFFTagSet 和 GeoTIFFTagSet 。

trans-unit.source: Additional Unicode line terminators may be recognized in future releases.
trans-unit.target: 更多的Unicode行终止符可能会在未来的版本中被识别。

trans-unit.source: Additional border styles include BevelBorder, SoftBevelBorder, EtchedBorder, LineBorder, TitledBorder, and MatteBorder.
trans-unit.target: 其他边框样式包括斜面边框、软斜面边框、蚀刻边框、线条边框、标题边框和哑光边框。

trans-unit.source: Additional improvements of such classes might entail precomputing pending counts so that they can be established in constructors, specializing classes for leaf steps, subdividing by say, four, instead of two per iteration, and using an adaptive threshold instead of always subdividing down to single elements.
trans-unit.target: 这种类的其他改进可能包括:预先计算待定计数,以便在构造函数中建立这些计数;对叶步进行特殊化处理;每次迭代按四次而不是两次进行细分;使用自适应阈值而不是总是细分到单个元素。

trans-unit.source: Additional information can be obtained from the DayOfWeek. This includes textual names of the values.
trans-unit.target: 可以从 DayOfWeek 获得更多信息。这包括值的文本名称。

trans-unit.source: Additional information is copied as appropriate to the nodeType, attempting to mirror the behavior expected if a fragment of XML or HTML source was copied from one document to another, recognizing that the two documents may have different DTDs in the XML case. The following list describes the specifics for each type of node.
trans-unit.target: 视情况将其他信息复制到 nodeType ，以尝试反映将XML或HTML源代码的片段从一个文档复制到另一个文档时预期的行为，并意识到两个文档在XML情况下可能具有不同的DTD。下表描述了每种类型的节点的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, a writer can acquire the read lock, but not vice-versa. Among other applications, reentrancy can be useful when write locks are held during calls or callbacks to methods that perform reads under read locks. If a reader tries to acquire the write lock it will never succeed.
trans-unit.target: 此外,写者可以获得读锁,但反之亦然。在其他应用中,当在读锁下执行读的方法的调用或回调过程中持有写锁时,重入性是非常有用的。如果一个读者试图获取写锁,它将永远不会成功。

trans-unit.target: 另外， MLet 可以读取配置文件，该配置文件指定要在与 MLet 相同的MBean服务器中注册的一组MBean 。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if a security manager is installed, a ServicePermission must be granted and the service principal of the permission must minimally be inside the KerberosPrincipal's realm. For example, if the result of new KerberosPrincipal("user") is user@EXAMPLE.COM, then a ServicePermission with service principal host/www.example.com@EXAMPLE.COM (and any action) must be granted.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果安装了安全管理器，则必须授予 ServicePermission ,并且该权限的服务主体必须至少位于 KerberosPrincipal 的领域内。例如，如果 new KerberosPrincipal("user") 为 user@EXAMPLE.COM ，则必须授予具有服务主体 host/www.example.com@EXAMPLE.COM 的 ServicePermission （以及任何操作）。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if this PermissionCollection contains the AllPermission, this method will always return true.
trans-unit.target: 此外,如果这个PermissionCollection包含AllPermission,这个方法将始终返回true。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, synthetic constructs in a class file, such as accessor methods used in implementing nested classes and bridge methods used in implementing covariant returns, are translation artifacts outside of this model.
trans-unit.target: 此外,类文件中的合成构造,如实现嵌套类时使用的访问器方法和实现共价返回时使用的桥接方法,都是本模型之外的翻译伪影。

trans-unit.source: Addresses -- This is the address assigned to the loopback interface. Anything sent to this IP address loops around and becomes IP input on the local host. This address is often used when testing a client.

trans-unit.source: Adds a KeyEventDispatcher to this KeyboardFocusManager's dispatcher chain.
trans-unit.target: 将一个KeyEventDispatcher添加到这个KeyboardFocusManager的调度器链上。

trans-unit.source: Adds a KeyEventDispatcher to this KeyboardFocusManager's dispatcher chain. This KeyboardFocusManager will request that each KeyEventDispatcher dispatch KeyEvents generated by the user before finally dispatching the KeyEvent itself. KeyEventDispatchers will be notified in the order in which they were added. Notifications will halt as soon as one KeyEventDispatcher returns true from its dispatchKeyEvent method. There is no limit to the total number of KeyEventDispatchers which can be added, nor to the number of times which a particular KeyEventDispatcher instance can be added.
trans-unit.target: 将KeyEventDispatcher添加到此KeyboardFocusManager的调度程序链。此KeyboardFocusManager将要求每个KeyEventDispatcher调度用户生成的KeyEvent，然后才最终调度KeyEvent本身。 KeyEventDispatchers将按照添加顺序通知。一旦一个KeyEventDispatcher从 dispatchKeyEvent 方法返回 true 时，通知将停止。可以添加的KeyEventDispatcher的总数没有限制，可以添加特定KeyEventDispatcher实例的次数也没有限制。

trans-unit.source: Adds a KeyEventPostProcessor to this KeyboardFocusManager's post- processor chain.
trans-unit.target: 在这个KeyboardFocusManager的后处理器链上添加一个KeyEventPostProcessor。

trans-unit.source: Adds a KeyEventPostProcessor to this KeyboardFocusManager's post- processor chain. After a KeyEvent has been dispatched to and handled by its target, KeyboardFocusManager will request that each KeyEventPostProcessor perform any necessary post-processing as part of the KeyEvent's final resolution. KeyEventPostProcessors will be notified in the order in which they were added; the current KeyboardFocusManager will be notified last. Notifications will halt as soon as one KeyEventPostProcessor returns true from its postProcessKeyEvent method. There is no limit to the total number of KeyEventPostProcessors that can be added, nor to the number of times that a particular KeyEventPostProcessor instance can be added.
trans-unit.target: 将KeyEventPostProcessor添加到此KeyboardFocusManager的后处理器链中。将KeyEvent调度到其目标并由其处理后，KeyboardFocusManager将请求每个KeyEventPostProcessor进行任何必要的后处理，以此作为KeyEvent最终解决方案的一部分。 KeyEventPostProcessor将按照添加顺序通知；当前的KeyboardFocusManager将在最后通知。只要一个KeyEventPostProcessor从其 postProcessKeyEvent 方法返回 true ，通知就会停止。可以添加的KeyEventPostProcessor的总数没有限制，可以添加特定KeyEventPostProcessor实例的次数也没有限制。

trans-unit.source: Adds a curved segment, defined by three new points, to the path by drawing a Bézier curve that intersects both the current coordinates and the specified coordinates (x3,y3), using the specified points (x1,y1) and (x2,y2) as Bézier control points.
trans-unit.target: 通过绘制一条Bézier曲线，使用指定的点 (x1,y1) 和 (x2,y2) 与当前坐标和指定的坐标 (x3,y3) 相交，将由三个新点定义的弯曲线段添加到路径中作为贝塞尔（Bézier）控制点。

trans-unit.source: Adds a curved segment, defined by three new points, to the path by drawing a Bézier curve that intersects both the current coordinates and the specified coordinates (x3,y3), using the specified points (x1,y1) and (x2,y2) as Bézier control points. All coordinates are specified in double precision.
trans-unit.target: 通过绘制一条Bézier曲线，使用指定的点 (x1,y1) 和 (x2,y2) 与当前坐标和指定的坐标 (x3,y3) 相交，将由三个新点定义的弯曲线段添加到路径中作为贝塞尔（Bézier）控制点。所有坐标均以双精度指定。

trans-unit.source: Adds a curved segment, defined by three new points, to the path by drawing a Bézier curve that intersects both the current coordinates and the specified coordinates (x3,y3), using the specified points (x1,y1) and (x2,y2) as Bézier control points. All coordinates are specified in float precision.
trans-unit.target: 通过绘制一条Bézier曲线，使用指定的点 (x1,y1) 和 (x2,y2) 与当前坐标和指定的坐标 (x3,y3) 相交，将由三个新点定义的弯曲线段添加到路径中作为贝塞尔（Bézier）控制点。所有坐标均以浮点精度指定。

trans-unit.source: Adds a curved segment, defined by two new points, to the path by drawing a Quadratic curve that intersects both the current coordinates and the specified coordinates (x2,y2), using the specified point (x1,y1) as a quadratic parametric control point.

trans-unit.source: Adds a curved segment, defined by two new points, to the path by drawing a Quadratic curve that intersects both the current coordinates and the specified coordinates (x2,y2), using the specified point (x1,y1) as a quadratic parametric control point. All coordinates are specified in double precision.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定点 (x1,y1) 作为二次参数控制点绘制一条与当前坐标和指定坐标 (x2,y2) 相交的二次曲线，将由两个新点定义的弯曲线段添加到路径中。所有坐标均以双精度指定。

trans-unit.source: Adds a curved segment, defined by two new points, to the path by drawing a Quadratic curve that intersects both the current coordinates and the specified coordinates (x2,y2), using the specified point (x1,y1) as a quadratic parametric control point. All coordinates are specified in float precision.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定点 (x1,y1) 作为二次参数控制点绘制一条与当前坐标和指定坐标 (x2,y2) 相交的二次曲线，将由两个新点定义的弯曲线段添加到路径中。所有坐标均以浮点精度指定。

trans-unit.source: Adds a dependence on a module with the given (and possibly empty) set of modifiers. The dependence includes the version of the module that was recorded at compile-time.

trans-unit.source: Adds a dependence on a module.

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when objects identified by the search filter filter and filter arguments at the object named by the string target name are modified.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器，以接收在修改由搜索过滤 filter 过滤器标识的对象和由字符串目标名称命名的对象处的过滤器参数时触发的命名事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when objects identified by the search filter filter and filter arguments at the object named by the string target name are modified. See the overload that accepts a Name for details of how this method behaves.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器，以接收由搜索过滤 filter 过滤器标识的对象和由字符串目标名称命名的对象的过滤器参数被修改时触发的命名事件。有关此方法的行为的详细信息，请参见接受 Name 的重载。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when objects identified by the search filter filter and filter arguments at the object named by the target are modified.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器，以接收由搜索过滤 filter 过滤器标识的对象和目标命名的对象处的过滤器参数被修改时触发的命名事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when objects identified by the search filter filter and filter arguments at the object named by the target are modified. The scope, returningObj flag, and returningAttributes flag from the search controls ctls are used to control the selection of objects that the listener is interested in, and determines what information is returned in the eventual NamingEvent object. Note that the requested information to be returned might not be present in the NamingEvent object if they are unavailable or could not be obtained by the service provider or service.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器，以接收由搜索过滤 filter 过滤器标识的对象和目标指定的对象处的过滤器参数被修改时触发的命名事件。搜索控件 ctls 中的作用域，returningObj标志和returningAttributes标志用于控制侦听器感兴趣的对象的选择，并确定最终 NamingEvent 对象返回的信息。请注意，如果服务提供者或服务无法获得这些信息，则返回的请求信息可能不存在于 NamingEvent 对象中。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when objects identified by the search filter filter at the object named by target are modified.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器，以接收在目标名称所命名的对象上由搜索过滤 filter 过滤器标识的对象被修改时触发的命名事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when objects identified by the search filter filter at the object named by the string target name are modified.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器，以接收在字符串目标名称所命名的对象上由搜索过滤 filter 过滤器标识的对象被修改时触发的命名事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when objects identified by the search filter filter at the object named by the string target name are modified. See the overload that accepts a Name for details of how this method behaves.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器，以接收在字符串目标名称所命名的对象上由搜索过滤 filter 过滤器标识的对象被修改时触发的命名事件。有关此方法的行为的详细信息，请参见接受 Name 的重载。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when the object named by the string target name and scope changes.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个监听器,用于接收当字符串目标名称和作用域命名的对象发生变化时触发的命名事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when the object named by the string target name and scope changes. See the overload that accepts a Name for details.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器，以接收当字符串目标名称和作用域命名的对象发生更改时触发的命名事件。有关详细信息，请参见接受 Name 的重载。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when the object(s) identified by a target and scope changes.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个监听器,用于接收当目标和作用域识别的对象发生变化时发射的命名事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when the object(s) identified by a target and scope changes. The event source of those events is this context. See the class description for a discussion on event source and target. See the descriptions of the constants OBJECT_SCOPE, ONELEVEL_SCOPE, and SUBTREE_SCOPE to see how scope affects the registration.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器，以接收当目标和作用域标识的对象发生更改时触发的命名事件。这些事件的事件源就是此上下文。有关事件源和目标的讨论，请参见类描述。请参阅常量 OBJECT_SCOPE ， ONELEVEL_SCOPE 和 SUBTREE_SCOPE 的描述，以了解 scope 如何影响注册。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for table column model events.
trans-unit.target: 为表列模型事件添加一个监听器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for the TreeModelEvent posted after the tree changes.
trans-unit.target: 为树更改后发布的 TreeModelEvent 添加一个侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for the TreeModelEvent posted after the tree changes.
trans-unit.target: 为树变化后发布的TreeModelEvent添加一个监听器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for the value change.
trans-unit.target: 为数值变化添加一个监听器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for the value change. When the property editor changes its value it should fire a PropertyChangeEvent on all registered PropertyChangeListeners, specifying the null value for the property name and itself as the source.
trans-unit.target: 为值更改添加一个侦听器。当属性编辑器改变其价值应该触发一个 PropertyChangeEvent 的所有注册 PropertyChangeListener S，指定 null 的属性名称和值本身作为源。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for the value change. When the property editor changes its value it should fire a PropertyChangeEvent on all registered PropertyChangeListeners, specifying the null value for the property name. If the source property is set, it should be used as the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 为值更改添加一个侦听器。属性编辑器更改其值时，应在所有已注册的 PropertyChangeEvent 上触发 PropertyChangeListener ，并为属性名称指定 null 值。如果设置了source属性，则应将其用作事件的源。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to a registered MBean.
trans-unit.target: 为注册的MBean添加一个监听器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to a registered MBean. Notifications emitted by the MBean will be forwarded to the listener.
trans-unit.target: 为注册的MBean添加一个监听器。MBean发出的通知将被转发给监听者。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to be informed of changes in connection status.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个监听器来通知连接状态的变化。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to be informed of changes in connection status. The listener will receive notifications of type JMXConnectionNotification. An implementation can send other types of notifications too.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器以通知连接状态的变化。侦听器将收到 JMXConnectionNotification 类型的通知。实现也可以发送其他类型的通知。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to be informed of changes in connection status. The listener will receive notifications of type JMXConnectionNotification. An implementation can send other types of notifications too.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器以通知连接状态的变化。侦听器将收到 JMXConnectionNotification 类型的通知。实现也可以发送其他类型的通知。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to receive adjustment events when the value of the adjustable object changes.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个监听器,当可调对象的值改变时,接收调整事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to receive item events when the state of an item is changed by the user.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个监听器,当用户改变项目状态时,接收项目事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to receive item events when the state of an item is changed by the user. Item events are not sent when an item's state is set programmatically. If l is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.
trans-unit.target: 当用户更改项目状态时，添加一个侦听器以接收项目事件。以编程方式设置项目状态时，不会发送项目事件。如果 l 为 null ，则不会引发异常，也不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to the list that is notified each time a change to the data model occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中添加一个监听器,每次数据模型发生变化时都会通知该监听器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to the list that is notified each time a change to the model occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中添加一个监听器,每次模型发生变化时都会通知该监听器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to the list that is notified each time a change to the model occurs. The source of ChangeEvents delivered to ChangeListeners will be this JSpinner. Note also that replacing the model will not affect listeners added directly to JSpinner. Applications can add listeners to the model directly. In that case is that the source of the event would be the SpinnerModel.
trans-unit.target: 将侦听器添加到每次更改模型时都会通知的列表。传递给 ChangeListeners 的 ChangeEvents 的来源将是此 JSpinner 。还要注意，替换模型不会影响直接添加到JSpinner的侦听器。应用程序可以直接将侦听器添加到模型。在这种情况下，事件的源将是 SpinnerModel 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to the list that's notified each time a change to the data model occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中添加一个监听器,每次数据模型发生变化时都会通知它。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to the list that's notified when the editor stops, or cancels editing.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中添加一个监听器,当编辑器停止或取消编辑时,监听器会收到通知。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to the list, to be notified each time a change to the selection occurs; the preferred way of listening for selection state changes.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中添加一个监听器,每次选择发生变化时都会得到通知;首选监听选择状态变化的方式。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to the list, to be notified each time a change to the selection occurs; the preferred way of listening for selection state changes. JList takes care of listening for selection state changes in the selection model, and notifies the given listener of each change. ListSelectionEvents sent to the listener have a source property set to this list.
trans-unit.target: 将侦听器添加到列表，每次选择发生更改时都将得到通知；侦听选择状态更改的首选方式。 JList 负责侦听选择模型中的选择状态更改，并将每个更改通知给指定的侦听器。发送到侦听器的 ListSelectionEvent 的 source 属性设置为此列表。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to this MBean.
trans-unit.target: 为这个MBean添加一个听众。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to this line.
trans-unit.target: 为这一行添加一个听众。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to this line. Whenever the line's status changes, the listener's update() method is called with a LineEvent object that describes the change.
trans-unit.target: 将侦听器添加到此行。每当行的状态发生更改时， LineEvent 通过描述更改的LineEvent对象调用侦听器的 update() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to track when styles are added or removed.

trans-unit.target: 每当属性发生变化时,都会给轨迹添加一个监听者。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to track whenever the caret position has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 每当改变音轨位置时,就会在音轨上添加一个监听者。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个听众。

trans-unit.source: Adds a mapping from a single String native to a single DataFlavor.
trans-unit.target: 添加从单个 String native到单个 DataFlavor 的映射。

trans-unit.source: Adds a mapping from a single String native to a single DataFlavor. Unlike getFlavorsForNative, the mapping will only be established in one direction, and the native will not be encoded. To establish a two-way mapping, call addUnencodedNativeForFlavor as well. The new mapping will be of lower priority than any existing mapping. This method has no effect if a mapping from the specified String native to the specified or equal DataFlavor already exists.
trans-unit.target: 添加从单个 String native到单个 DataFlavor 的映射。与 getFlavorsForNative 不同，映射将仅在一个方向上建立，并且本机将不被编码。要建立双向映射，请同时调用 addUnencodedNativeForFlavor 。新映射的优先级将低于任何现有映射。如果已经存在从指定的 String 本机到指定的或相等的 DataFlavor 的映射，则此方法无效。

trans-unit.source: Adds a mapping from the specified DataFlavor (and all DataFlavors equal to the specified DataFlavor) to the specified String native.
trans-unit.target: 添加从指定的映射 DataFlavor （和所有 DataFlavor 能胜任指定 DataFlavor ）到指定的 String 天然。

trans-unit.source: Adds a mapping from the specified DataFlavor (and all DataFlavors equal to the specified DataFlavor) to the specified String native. Unlike getNativesForFlavor, the mapping will only be established in one direction, and the native will not be encoded. To establish a two-way mapping, call addFlavorForUnencodedNative as well. The new mapping will be of lower priority than any existing mapping. This method has no effect if a mapping from the specified or equal DataFlavor to the specified String native already exists.
trans-unit.target: 添加从指定的映射 DataFlavor （和所有 DataFlavor 能胜任指定 DataFlavor ）到指定的 String 天然。与 getNativesForFlavor 不同，映射将仅在一个方向上建立，而本机将不被编码。要建立双向映射，请同时调用 addFlavorForUnencodedNative 。新映射的优先级将低于任何现有映射。如果已经存在从指定或相等的 DataFlavor 到指定的 String native的映射，则此方法无效。

trans-unit.source: Adds a mechanism specific credential-element to an existing credential.
trans-unit.target: 在现有的凭证上添加一个特定机制的凭证元素。

trans-unit.source: Adds a mechanism specific credential-element to an existing credential. This method allows the construction of credentials, one mechanism at a time.
trans-unit.target: 为现有的凭证添加一个特定机制的凭证元素。这种方法允许一次只构建一个机制的凭证。

trans-unit.source: Adds a mnemonic name for a particular value that this tag's data may take on.
trans-unit.target: 为此标记的数据可能采用的特定值添加一个记号名称。

trans-unit.source: Adds a mnemonic name for a particular value that this tag's data may take on. Mnemonic names apply only to tags which have integral data type.
trans-unit.target: 为此标记的数据可能采用的特定值添加一个记号名称。符号名称仅适用于具有整体数据类型的标记。

trans-unit.source: Adds a name to the issuerNames criterion.
trans-unit.target: 在发行商名称标准中添加一个名称。

trans-unit.source: Adds a name to the issuerNames criterion. The issuer distinguished name in the X509CRL must match at least one of the specified distinguished names.
trans-unit.target: 将名称添加到issuerNames条件。 X509CRL 中的颁发者专有名称必须至少与指定的专有名称之一匹配。

trans-unit.source: Adds a name to the pathToNames criterion.
trans-unit.target: 在pathToNames标准中添加一个名字。

trans-unit.source: Adds a name to the pathToNames criterion. The X509Certificate must not include name constraints that would prohibit building a path to the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 向pathToNames条件添加名称。在 X509Certificate 不得包含名称限制，禁止建设到指定名称的路径。

trans-unit.source: Adds a name to the subjectAlternativeNames criterion.
trans-unit.target: 在subjectAlternativeNames标准中添加一个名称。

trans-unit.source: Adds a name to the subjectAlternativeNames criterion. The X509Certificate must contain all or at least one of the specified subjectAlternativeNames, depending on the value of the matchAllNames flag (see setMatchAllSubjectAltNames).
trans-unit.target: 将名称添加到subjectAlternativeNames条件。该 X509Certificate 必须包含所有或指定的subjectAlternativeNames中的至少一个，这取决于matchAllNames标志的值（见 setMatchAllSubjectAltNames ）。

trans-unit.source: Adds a name to the subjectAlternativeNames criterion. The X509Certificate must contain all or at least one of the specified subjectAlternativeNames, depending on the value of the matchAllNames flag (see setMatchAllSubjectAltNames).
trans-unit.target: 将名称添加到subjectAlternativeNames条件。该 X509Certificate 必须包含所有或指定的subjectAlternativeNames中的至少一个，这取决于matchAllNames标志的值（见 setMatchAllSubjectAltNames ）。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new DropTargetListener (UNICAST SOURCE).
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新的 DropTargetListener （UNICAST SOURCE）。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new JButton which dispatches the action.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新的 JButton ，该JButton调度操作。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新的属性节点。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute node. If an attribute with that name ( nodeName) is already present in the element, it is replaced by the new one. Replacing an attribute node by itself has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新的属性节点。如果元素中已经存在具有该名称的属性（ nodeName ），则将其替换为新属性。单独替换属性节点无效。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute to a previously defined element that may be set to an arbitrary value.
trans-unit.target: 为先前定义的元素添加一个新的属性,该属性可以设置为一个任意值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute to a previously defined element that will be defined by a list of values.
trans-unit.target: 为先前定义的元素添加一个新的属性,该属性将由一个值列表来定义。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute to a previously defined element that will be defined by a range of values.
trans-unit.target: 为先前定义的元素添加一个新的属性,该属性将由一个值的范围来定义。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute to a previously defined element that will be defined by a set of enumerated values.
trans-unit.target: 为先前定义的元素添加一个新的属性,该属性将由一组枚举值定义。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute to a previously defined element that will be defined by the enumerated values TRUE and FALSE, with a datatype of DATATYPE_BOOLEAN.
trans-unit.target: 向先前定义的元素添加新属性，该元素将由数据类型 DATATYPE_BOOLEAN 的枚举值 TRUE 和 FALSE 定义。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute to the attribute set.
trans-unit.target: 向属性集添加一个新属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute. If an attribute with that local name and that namespace URI is already present in the element, it is replaced by the new one. Replacing an attribute node by itself has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新的属性,如果元素中已经存在一个本地名称和命名空间URI的属性,则会被新的属性取代。如果元素中已经存在一个具有该本地名称和命名空间URI的属性,则会被新的属性替换。替换一个属性节点本身没有效果。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute. If an attribute with that name is already present in the element, its value is changed to be that of the value parameter. This value is a simple string; it is not parsed as it is being set. So any markup (such as syntax to be recognized as an entity reference) is treated as literal text, and needs to be appropriately escaped by the implementation when it is written out. In order to assign an attribute value that contains entity references, the user must create an Attr node plus any Text and EntityReference nodes, build the appropriate subtree, and use setAttributeNode to assign it as the value of an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新属性。如果元素中已经存在具有该名称的属性，则其值将更改为value参数的值。这个值是一个简单的字符串；设置时未对其进行解析。因此，任何标记（例如将被识别为实体引用的语法）都被视为原义文本，并且在实现时需要适当地对其进行转义。为了分配包含实体引用的属性值，用户必须创建一个 Attr 节点以及任何 Text 和 EntityReference 节点，构建适当的子树，并使用 setAttributeNode 将其分配为属性值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute. If an attribute with the same local name and namespace URI is already present on the element, its prefix is changed to be the prefix part of the qualifiedName, and its value is changed to be the value parameter. This value is a simple string; it is not parsed as it is being set. So any markup (such as syntax to be recognized as an entity reference) is treated as literal text, and needs to be appropriately escaped by the implementation when it is written out. In order to assign an attribute value that contains entity references, the user must create an Attr node plus any Text and EntityReference nodes, build the appropriate subtree, and use setAttributeNodeNS or setAttributeNode to assign it as the value of an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新的属性。如果元素上已经存在具有相同本地名称和名称空间URI的属性，则其前缀将更改为 qualifiedName 的前缀部分，并且其值将更改为 value 参数。这个值是一个简单的字符串；设置时未对其进行解析。因此，任何标记（例如将被识别为实体引用的语法）都被视为原义文本，并且在写入时需要实现适当地对其进行转义。为了分配包含实体引用的属性值，用户必须创建一个 Attr 节点以及任何 Text 和 EntityReference 节点，构建适当的子树，并使用 setAttributeNodeNS 或 setAttributeNode 将其分配为属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new element type to this metadata document format with a child policy of CHILD_POLICY_REPEAT.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CHILD_POLICY_REPEAT 的子策略向此元数据文档格式添加新的元素类型。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new element type to this metadata document format with a child policy other than CHILD_POLICY_REPEAT.
trans-unit.target: 使用除 CHILD_POLICY_REPEAT 之外的子策略将新元素类型添加到此元数据文档格式。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new environment property to the environment of this context.
trans-unit.target: 为这个上下文的环境添加一个新的环境属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new environment property to the environment of this context. If the property already exists, its value is overwritten. See class description for more details on environment properties.
trans-unit.target: 在此上下文的环境中添加一个新的环境属性。如果该属性已经存在,它的值将被覆盖。关于环境属性的更多细节,请参见类描述。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new event to the track.
trans-unit.target: 在轨道上添加一个新的事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new event to the track. However, if the event is already contained in the track, it is not added again. The list of events is kept in time order, meaning that this event inserted at the appropriate place in the list, not necessarily at the end.
trans-unit.target: 将新事件添加到轨迹中。但是,如果该事件已经包含在轨道中,则不会再次添加。事件列表是按时间顺序排列的,这意味着该事件插入在列表的适当位置,而不一定是在最后。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new keymap into the keymap hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在键图层次结构中添加一个新的键图。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new keymap into the keymap hierarchy. Keymap bindings resolve from bottom up so an attribute specified in a child will override an attribute specified in the parent.
trans-unit.target: 在map层次结构中添加一个新的keymap。抠像图绑定是自下而上解析的,所以子图中指定的属性将覆盖父图中指定的属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new provider, at a specified position.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的位置添加一个新的提供者。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new provider, at a specified position. The position is the preference order in which providers are searched for requested algorithms. The position is 1-based, that is, 1 is most preferred, followed by 2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的位置添加一个新的提供者。位置是搜索所请求算法的提供者的优先顺序。位置是以1为基础的,也就是说,1是最优先的,其次是2,以此类推。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new relation to the current relation set.
trans-unit.target: 向当前关系集添加一个新关系。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new relation to the current relation set. If the relation is already in the relation set, the target(s) of the specified relation is merged with the target(s) of the existing relation. Otherwise, the new relation is added to the relation set.
trans-unit.target: 在当前关系集中添加一个新关系。如果关系已经在关系集中,指定关系的目标将与现有关系的目标合并。否则,新关系将被添加到关系集中。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new state to the current state set if it is not already present.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前状态集不存在,则添加新的状态。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new state to the current state set if it is not already present. If the state is already in the state set, the state set is unchanged and the return value is false. Otherwise, the state is added to the state set and the return value is true.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚不存在，则将新状态添加到当前状态集中。如果状态已经在状态集中，则状态集不变并且返回值为 false 。否则，将状态添加到状态集中，并且返回值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new style into the logical style hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在逻辑样式层次结构中添加一个新样式。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new style into the logical style hierarchy. Style attributes resolve from bottom up so an attribute specified in a child will override an attribute specified in the parent.
trans-unit.target: 在逻辑样式层次中添加一个新样式。样式属性从下往上解析,所以在子样式中指定的属性将覆盖在父样式中指定的属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new style into the style hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在样式层次结构中添加一个新样式。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new style into the style hierarchy. Style attributes resolve from bottom up so an attribute specified in a child will override an attribute specified in the parent.
trans-unit.target: 在样式层次结构中添加一个新的样式。样式属性从下往上解析,所以在子样式中指定的属性将覆盖在父样式中指定的属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new unarrived party to this phaser.
trans-unit.target: 给这个相位器增加了一个新的未到的方。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new unarrived party to this phaser. If an ongoing invocation of onAdvance(int, int) is in progress, this method may await its completion before returning. If this phaser has a parent, and this phaser previously had no registered parties, this child phaser is also registered with its parent. If this phaser is terminated, the attempt to register has no effect, and a negative value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 向此移相器添加一个新的未到达方。如果正在进行 onAdvance(int, int) 调用，则此方法可能在返回之前等待其完成。如果此相位器有一个父级，并且此相位器以前没有注册方，则此子相位器也将在其父级中注册。如果此移相器终止，则尝试注册无效，并且返回负值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new unarrived party to this phaser. If an ongoing invocation of onAdvance(int, int) is in progress, this method may await its completion before returning. If this phaser has a parent, and this phaser previously had no registered parties, this child phaser is also registered with its parent. If this phaser is terminated, the attempt to register has no effect, and a negative value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 向此移相器添加一个新的未到达方。如果正在进行 onAdvance(int, int) 调用，则此方法可能在返回之前等待其完成。如果此相位器具有父级，并且此相位器以前没有注册方，则此子相位器也将与其父级一起注册。如果此相位器终止，则尝试注册无效，并且返回负值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new value to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 为属性添加一个新的值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new value to the attribute. If the attribute values are unordered and attrVal is already in the attribute, this method does nothing. If the attribute values are ordered, attrVal is added to the end of the list of attribute values.
trans-unit.target: 将新值添加到属性。如果属性值是无序的并且 attrVal 已经在属性中，则此方法不执行任何操作。如果属性值是有序的，则 attrVal 将添加到属性值列表的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new value to this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 为该属性添加一个新值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a node using its namespaceURI and localName.
trans-unit.target: 使用其 namespaceURI 和 localName 添加节点。

trans-unit.source: Adds a node using its namespaceURI and localName. If a node with that namespace URI and that local name is already present in this map, it is replaced by the new one. Replacing a node by itself has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 使用其 namespaceURI 和 localName 添加节点。如果此映射中已经存在具有该名称空间URI和该本地名称的节点，则将其替换为新节点。单独替换节点无效。

trans-unit.source: Adds a node using its nodeName attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用其 nodeName 属性添加节点。

trans-unit.source: Adds a node using its nodeName attribute. If a node with that name is already present in this map, it is replaced by the new one. Replacing a node by itself has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 使用其 nodeName 属性添加节点。如果此映射中已经存在具有该名称的节点，则将其替换为新的节点。单独替换节点无效。

trans-unit.source: Adds a permission object to the PermissionCollection for the class the permission belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 为权限所属的类添加一个权限对象到PermissionCollection中。

trans-unit.source: Adds a permission object to the PermissionCollection for the class the permission belongs to. For example, if
trans-unit.target: 为权限所属的类添加一个权限对象到PermissionCollection中。例如,如果

trans-unit.source: Adds a permission object to the current collection of permission objects.
trans-unit.target: 在当前的权限对象集合中添加一个权限对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds a point to the path by drawing a straight line from the current coordinates to the new specified coordinates specified in double precision.
trans-unit.target: 在路径上添加一个点,从当前坐标到指定的新坐标,用双精度画一条直线。

trans-unit.source: Adds a point to the path by drawing a straight line from the current coordinates to the new specified coordinates specified in float precision.
trans-unit.target: 在路径上添加一个点,从当前坐标到以浮点精度指定的新坐标,画一条直线。

trans-unit.source: Adds a point to the path by moving to the specified coordinates specified in double precision.
trans-unit.target: 在路径上添加一个点,移动到以双精度指定的坐标上。

trans-unit.source: Adds a point to the path by moving to the specified coordinates specified in float precision.
trans-unit.target: 在路径上添加一个点,移动到以浮点精度指定的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Adds a point, specified by the double precision arguments newx and newy, to this Rectangle2D.
trans-unit.target: 将一个由双精度参数 newx 和 newy 指定的点添加到此 Rectangle2D 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a point, specified by the double precision arguments newx and newy, to this Rectangle2D. The resulting Rectangle2D is the smallest Rectangle2D that contains both the original Rectangle2D and the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 将一个由双精度参数 newx 和 newy 指定的点添加到此 Rectangle2D 。生成的 Rectangle2D 是包含原始 Rectangle2D 和指定点的最小 Rectangle2D 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a point, specified by the integer arguments newx,newy to the bounds of this Rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 将一个由整数参数 newx,newy 指定的点添加到此 Rectangle 的边界中。

trans-unit.source: Adds a provider to the next position available.
trans-unit.target: 将一个提供者添加到下一个可用职位。

trans-unit.source: Adds a recorder listener and captures the AccessControlContext to use when invoking the listener.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个记录器侦听器并捕获调用侦听器时要使用的 AccessControlContext 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a resource bundle to the list of resource bundles that are searched for localized values.
trans-unit.target: 将资源包添加到搜索本地化值的资源包列表中。

trans-unit.source: Adds a resource bundle to the list of resource bundles that are searched for localized values. Resource bundles are searched in the reverse order they were added, using the system class loader. In other words, the most recently added bundle is searched first.
trans-unit.target: 将资源包添加到搜索本地化值的资源包列表中。使用系统类加载器，以与添加资源束相反的顺序搜索资源束。换句话说，首先搜索最近添加的包。

trans-unit.source: Adds a rigid gap to this Group.
trans-unit.target: 给该 Group 增加了一个刚性的缺口。

trans-unit.source: Adds a row to the end of the model.
trans-unit.target: 在模型的末尾添加一行。

trans-unit.source: Adds a row to the end of the model. The new row will contain null values unless rowData is specified. Notification of the row being added will be generated.
trans-unit.target: 在模型末尾添加一行。除非指定 rowData ,否则新行将包含 null 值。将生成有关要添加的行的通知。

trans-unit.source: Adds a scaled image to the list of images being tracked by this media tracker.
trans-unit.target: 将缩放的图像添加到此媒体跟踪器正在跟踪的图像列表中。

trans-unit.source: Adds a scaled image to the list of images being tracked by this media tracker. The image will eventually be rendered at the indicated width and height.
trans-unit.target: 将缩放的图像添加到该媒体跟踪器正在跟踪的图像列表中。图像最终将以指定的宽度和高度呈现。

trans-unit.source: Adds a separator line, or a hypen, to the menu at the current position.
trans-unit.target: 在当前位置的菜单上添加一条分隔线,或一个连字符。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service dependence.
trans-unit.target: 增加了一个服务依赖性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service provider object to the registry.
trans-unit.target: 向注册表添加一个服务提供者对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service provider object to the registry. The provider is associated with the given category.
trans-unit.target: 向登记处添加服务提供者对象。服务提供者与给定类别相关联。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service provider object to the registry. The provider is associated within each category present in the registry whose Class it implements.
trans-unit.target: 将服务提供者对象添加到注册表。提供程序与它实现的 Class 的注册表中存在的每个类别相关联。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service to this BeanContext.
trans-unit.target: 为这个BeanContext添加一个服务。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service to this BeanContext. BeanContextServiceProviders call this method to register a particular service with this context. If the service has not previously been added, the BeanContextServices associates the service with the BeanContextServiceProvider and fires a BeanContextServiceAvailableEvent to all currently registered BeanContextServicesListeners. The method then returns true, indicating that the addition of the service was successful. If the given service has already been added, this method simply returns false.
trans-unit.target: 向此BeanContext添加服务。 BeanContextServiceProvider 调用此方法以在此上下文中注册特定服务。如果服务以前没有添加时， BeanContextServices 中关联与服务 BeanContextServiceProvider 并触发一个 BeanContextServiceAvailableEvent 到所有当前已注册 BeanContextServicesListeners 。然后，该方法返回 true ，指示添加服务成功。如果已经添加了给定的服务，则此方法仅返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of attributes to a subrange of the string.
trans-unit.target: 为字符串的子范围添加一组属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of attributes to the element.
trans-unit.target: 为元素添加一组属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of attributes to the element. If any of these attributes are StyleConstants attributes, they will be converted to CSS prior to forwarding to the superclass behavior.
trans-unit.target: 为元素添加一组属性。如果这些属性中有任何一个是StyleConstants属性,它们将在转发到超类行为之前被转换为CSS。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of attributes to the list.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中添加一组属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of parameters to this PreparedStatement object's batch of commands.
trans-unit.target: 将一组参数添加到此 PreparedStatement 对象的命令批中。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of rules to the sheet.
trans-unit.target: 向工作表添加一组规则。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of rules to the sheet. The rules are expected to be in valid CSS format. Typically this would be called as a result of parsing a <style> tag.
trans-unit.target: 向工作表添加一组规则。规则应采用有效的CSS格式。通常，这是由于解析<style>标记而被调用的。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of service provider objects, taken from an Iterator to the registry.
trans-unit.target: 将一组服务提供者对象（从 Iterator 中获取)添加到注册表中。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of service provider objects, taken from an Iterator to the registry. Each provider is associated within each category present in the registry whose Class it implements.
trans-unit.target: 将一组服务提供者对象（从 Iterator 中获取)添加到注册表中。每个提供程序都与它实现其 Class 的注册表中存在的每个类别相关联。

trans-unit.source: Adds a signed amount to the specified calendar field without changing larger fields.
trans-unit.target: 在不改变较大的字段的情况下,向指定的日历字段添加已签名的金额。

trans-unit.source: Adds a signed amount to the specified calendar field without changing larger fields. A negative roll amount means to subtract from field without changing larger fields. If the specified amount is 0, this method performs nothing.
trans-unit.target: 在不改变较大的字段的情况下,向指定的日历字段添加有符号的数量。负的卷积意味着从字段中减去,而不改变更大的字段。如果指定的金额为0,本方法不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single RDN at a specified position within this LDAP name.
trans-unit.target: 在这个LDAP名称的指定位置添加一个RDN。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single RDN at a specified position within this LDAP name. RDNs of this LDAP name at or after the index (if any) of the new RDN are shifted up by one (away from index 0) to accommodate the new RDN.
trans-unit.target: 在这个LDAP名称的指定位置添加一个RDN。在新的 RDN 的索引(如果有的话)处或之后的 LDAP 名称的 RDN 将向上移动一个(远离索引 0),以容纳新的 RDN。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single RDN to the end of this LDAP name.
trans-unit.target: 在这个LDAP名称的末尾添加一个RDN。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component at a specified position within this LDAP name.
trans-unit.target: 在这个LDAP名称的指定位置添加一个单独的组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component at a specified position within this LDAP name. Components of this LDAP name at or after the index (if any) of the new component are shifted up by one (away from index 0) to accommodate the new component.
trans-unit.target: 在这个LDAP名称的指定位置添加一个组件。在新组件的索引(如果有的话)之后的LDAP名称的组件将向上移动一个(从索引0开始)以容纳新组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component at a specified position within this composite name.
trans-unit.target: 在该合成名称中的指定位置添加一个单独的组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component at a specified position within this composite name. Components of this composite name at or after the index of the new component are shifted up by one (away from index 0) to accommodate the new component.
trans-unit.target: 在这个合成名称的指定位置添加一个组件。该合成名称中位于新组件索引处或之后的组件将向上移动一个(远离索引0),以容纳新组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component at a specified position within this compound name.
trans-unit.target: 在该化合物名称中的指定位置添加单个组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component at a specified position within this compound name. Components of this compound name at or after the index of the new component are shifted up by one (away from index 0) to accommodate the new component.
trans-unit.target: 在这个复合名称的指定位置添加一个组件。在新组件的索引处或之后的复合名称的组件将向上移动一个(远离索引0),以容纳新组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component at a specified position within this name.
trans-unit.target: 在该名称的指定位置添加单个组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component at a specified position within this name. Components of this name at or after the index of the new component are shifted up by one (away from index 0) to accommodate the new component.
trans-unit.target: 在这个名称的指定位置添加一个组件。在新组件的索引处或之后的这个名称的组件将向上移动一个(远离索引0),以容纳新组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component to the end of remaining name.
trans-unit.target: 在剩余名称的末尾添加一个组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component to the end of this LDAP name.
trans-unit.target: 在这个LDAP名称的末尾添加一个组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component to the end of this composite name.
trans-unit.target: 在这个复合名称的末尾添加一个单独的组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component to the end of this compound name.
trans-unit.target: 在这个化合物名称的末尾添加一个单独的组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component to the end of this name.
trans-unit.target: 在此名称的末尾添加一个单独的组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a specified listener so that it receives notification of events describing the progress of this compilation task.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个指定的监听器,使其接收描述该编译任务进度的事件通知。

trans-unit.source: Adds a specified listener so that it receives notification of events describing the progress of this compilation task. This method may be called at any time before or during the compilation.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个指定的监听器,使其接收描述该编译任务进度的事件通知。本方法可在编译前或编译过程中的任何时候调用。

trans-unit.source: Adds a tile observer.
trans-unit.target: 增加一个瓦片观察器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a tile observer. If the observer is already present, it receives multiple notifications.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个瓦片观察者,如果观察者已经存在,它将收到多个通知。如果观察者已经存在,它将收到多个通知。

trans-unit.source: Adds a title to an existing border, with default positioning (determined by the current look and feel), default justification (leading) and the default font and text color (determined by the current look and feel).
trans-unit.target: 在现有的边框上添加一个标题,具有默认的定位(由当前的外观和感觉决定)、默认的对齐(前导)和默认的字体和文本颜色(由当前的外观和感觉决定)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a title to an existing border, with the specified positioning and font, and using the default text color (determined by the current look and feel).
trans-unit.target: 在现有边框上添加一个标题,使用指定的位置和字体,并使用默认的文本颜色(由当前的外观和感觉决定)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a title to an existing border, with the specified positioning and using the default font and text color (determined by the current look and feel).

trans-unit.target: 将action-listener-a和action-listener-b添加到一起,并返回产生的多播监听器。
